Achievements.Name: Starfleet Academy Graduate
Achievements.Description: Complete the Tutorial Mission.

Achievements.Name: Captain Archer Award
Achievements.Description: Complete all missions in the Enterprise era.

Achievements.Name: Admiral Kirk Award
Achievements.Description: Complete all missions in the TOS era.

Achievements.Name: Starfleet Ensign
Achievements.Description: Complete the single player campaign on "Ensign" difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Starfleet Captain
Achievements.Description: Complete the single player campaign on "Captain" difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Starfleet Admiral
Achievements.Description: Complete the single player campaign on "Admiral" difficulty.

Achievements.Name: T'Pol Award
Achievements.Description: Complete the Enterprise era without losing a single ship.

Achievements.Name: Spock Award
Achievements.Description: Complete the Original Series era without losing a single ship.

Achievements.Name: Riker Award
Achievements.Description: Complete the Next Generation era without losing a single ship.

Achievements.Name: Guardian of Epsilon Theta
Achievements.Description: Protect all the medical ships in "Be My Shepherd".

Achievements.Name: Protector of Encaria
Achievements.Description: Keep the poisonous spore count low during "Poisoned Well".

Achievements.Name: Tyburn Shockwave
Achievements.Description: During "Stirring the Hive", knockout as many of the enemy fleet as you can in one blow...

Achievements.Name: Lone Wolf of Makus
Achievements.Description: Complete mission objectives in "The Squeeze" without the aid of starbases. You maverick renegade.

Achievements.Name: Liberator of Makus
Achievements.Description: Secure all enemy strongholds in "The Squeeze".

Achievements.Name: Pacifist of Makus
Achievements.Description: Complete "The Squeeze" without spilling any bloodâ€¦

Achievements.Name: Agile Predator
Achievements.Description: Complete "Behind Enemy lines" unscathed...

Achievements.Name: Brazen Warrior
Achievements.Description: Never hide from your enemy in "Behind Enemy Lines".

Achievements.Name: Hero of Kathra
Achievements.Description: Don't allow your allies to perish in "FireStorm".

Achievements.Name: Scourge of Kathra
Achievements.Description: Roll like a wave of destruction through the Kathra systemâ€¦

Achievements.Name: Champion of the Fleet
Achievements.Description: All allies must survive in "At the Gates".

Achievements.Name: Spirit of Kahless
Achievements.Description: Strike only at the heart of the enemy in "Omega".

Achievements.Name: Custodian of Phidian
Achievements.Description: Save the sensor relays in "Revelations".

Achievements.Name: Guerilla In The Mist
Achievements.Description: Spill no blood in "Ambush".

Achievements.Name: Sword of Aurelia
Achievements.Description: Take a swing at the bully in "Anger and Mercy"â€¦

Achievements.Name: Savior of Aurelia
Achievements.Description: Protect your ward in "Anger and Mercy".

Achievements.Name: Allied Commander
Achievements.Description: Be a team player in "Generals".

Achievements.Name: Autonomous Operator
Achievements.Description: Complete the final mission without the use of support craft.

Achievements.Name: Antique Collector
Achievements.Description: Start a mission in the Next Generation era with a fleet containing a Enterprise era ship.

Achievements.Name: Chain Reaction
Achievements.Description: Deliver the killing blow to more than one ship with a single torpedo.

Achievements.Name: Legacy Captain
Achievements.Description: Unlock the USS Legacy.

Achievements.Name: Glorious Victor
Achievements.Description: Test your mettle in battle against opponents.

Achievements.Name: Keeper of Gre'thor
Achievements.Description: Send 10 Klingon vessels to Sto'Vo'Kor in one online match.

Achievements.Name: Avenger of Surak
Achievements.Description: Destroy 10 Romulan ships in one online battleâ€¦ if you can find them.

Achievements.Name: Resistance Was Useful
Achievements.Description: Eradicate 10 Borg ships in a single online match.

Achievements.Name: The Wrath Of Khan
Achievements.Description: Destroy 10 Federation ships in a single online battle.

Achievements.Name: Anonymous Red-Shirt Award
Achievements.Description: Be the first to go down in a 4 fleet multiplayer game.
